Package eu.tivian.gui

Class Palette

java.lang.Object
eu.tivian.gui.Palette
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<Color>
public class Palette
extends Object
implements Iterable<Color>
Commodore 16 palette.
Based on Colodore.
Since:
2019-12-03
Author:
Pawe≈Ç Kania, Pepto
See Also:
Colodore source code, TED System Hardware Manual about video output

    • get

      public Color get​(int i)
      Returns i-th color in the palette.
      Parameters:
      i - index of the color in the palette
      Returns:
      Color object of the requested palette color
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if the i parameter is out of range (i ≤ 0 || i ≥ 121)

    • size

      Returns the size of the palette.
      Returns:
      the size of the palette.

    • gamma

      private double gamma​(double value)
      Calculates the gamma from PAL to sRGB value.
      Parameters:
      value - gamma value suitable for PAL signal
      Returns:
      gamma value suitable for sRGB spectrum

      private double yuv2r​(double y, double v)
      Converts the YUV color to the red component of RGB format.
      Parameters:

      v - red projection
      Returns:
      red component of RGB
      See Also:
      BT.601 Standard
